short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display more informations of a domain/ipv4/ipv6/nameserver

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to acquire the RDAP details of a domain, name servers, IPv4, IPv6 and ASN. 
This extension automatically capture the url from the browser.

The full information of a Domain / Name Server / IPv4 / IPv6
1. DNS information of a Domain.
2. Registration Information.
3. Country.
4. ASN information.
5. All remarks.
6. All notices. etc
